attributes.action: Provide free care for the elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is unfair that a person who works and saves for his old age must pay for care, whereas a person who does not work or save his money is catered for This encourages people not to work or save.
Why should the people who try to provide for themselves and their families be victimised for being thoughtful and careful with their money and why should they pay for those who are not.
I agree that some peoples circumstances are beyond their control,and I believe that they should be taken care of, but there are others who we all know who go through life taking what they can and never giving anything, I believe that at least the person who tries should at least be on equal terms .
As it is there is no incentive to work or save for old age.
